definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: in fig. of snares of wicked Ps 140:6.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: = course of action, or life, [[רַגֱלְָ]] ´[[מ]] Pr 4:26, ´[[מ]] Pr 5:21 (‖[[דַּרְכֵי־אִישׁ]]); specif. good, right, [[חֶדֶק]] ´[[מ]] Ps 23:3, [[ישֶׁר]] ´[[מ]] Pr 4:11, [[טוֹב]] ´[[מ]] Pr 2:9, [[חַדִּיק]] ´[[מ]] Is 26:7; bad sense Pr 2:15, Pr 2:18, Pr 5:6, Is 59:8; tracks of ´[[י]] are those approved by him Ps 17:5; or those traversed by him, [[מַעְגׇּלֶי ְוִרְעֲפוּן]] [[דָָּשֶׁן]] Ps 65:12 fig. of richly-laden cart dropping its contents in its track.
